column5: Some of you have been questioning my new role as member here and I just wanted to set the record straight. A few months ago I was diagnosed with diabetes. But when the treatment for that didn't work, they set out looking for other answers. Given my history with cancer, that was where they started. They found a tumor on my adrenal gland and kidney. I then got severe gout on and off. The treatment and prognosis are excellent! It became necessary for me to sell off my web design business. Because of that I have a contract that says I cannot have contact with former clients for 90 days (the new owner owns all contracts now) nor can I engage in any new web design projects for six months. I have also taken a temporary leave of my admin duties here. I can't do much until the gout goes away anyway. Hope to be back to everything normal in a month or two!
Iwish you all the best and hope your health improves.
Yet another kick in the teeth . Remove that target on yourself Rick. Hope EVERYTHING turns out great for you. Keeping our fingers crossed.
Take time to get well Rick.We will be here when ya get back. Good luck to you.   Paul
I couldn't send you a pm.   I'm sure it won't easy, but maybe you can get some more fishin' in.
Sorry to hear about your recent tough luck Rick, but you've overcome bad times before and you'll do the same this time.  Take care of yourself bud.
Sorry to hear about more health concerns Rick. Wishing you the best in wading through this latest challenge.
Hey Rick,  I feel for you with the gout,  I get that baby maybe 2x a year---it hurts like hell and makes it impossible to walk or even sleep.  Best of luck  Bushart

I'm sorry to hear about you diabetes Rick.. Just like others have said.. You are tough and you will also beat this,.. Take good care of your self my friend.. Was wondering where you were now we all know
